article_title: Americans Don't Understand Basic Health Terms, Let Alone Obamacare

article_metadata.description: Even as millions of Americans gain health insurance coverage, they lack understanding of basic terms that impact their out-of-pocket costs and whether a doctor is even available to them. A new analysis by Rice University shows one in four adults in Texas “lacked confidence in understanding” the most basic terms related to [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
